title: 6.3 Master Challenge 1
question:
Consider the following array of numbers:
{260, 337, 181, 420, 373, 89, 15, 91, 22, 116}
Task 1: Write a program to traverse the array and print all the odd numbers contained within it.
Task 2: Write a program to traverse the array and print all the even numbers contained within it.

Note: You may use a built-in function to determine whether a number is odd or write your own logic.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
